trends: There has been one other sighting in Tonganoxie
There were no other sightings in Tonganoxie on or around December 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsFor almost a year exactly I have been seeing glowing light orbs. First one I was lying in bed and saw a very bright "new" planet that I head never seen before pursue my window. I laid there a long time wondering what it was. When I turned to ask my husband to look it vanished. Several Weeks later I could see it out my other bedroom window and it too vanished when I tried to wake my husband to see it. On and of for months a would see it. Then December 2011, a couple Weeks before Christmas my soon was driving us home in the dark. I was playing solitaire on my phone. He turned onto our street and said, "OMG!"and above a hill that is usually covered with cows were 3 light orbs in a triangle pattern.Before I could switch the camera on my phone one light went left, one went right, and the other went up. This was around 7pm on a Thursday night. Christmas morning around 5am my ambitious children woke up and upon entering my room to wake me saw the 3 orbs in a triangle again and closer to the house. The orbs left before I awoke. We have not seen any since and I have kept this quiet until these recent sightings. This was the first time someone beside myself has seem these.
